fields.name: CreatedDate
fields.description: The creation date of the schedule.

fields.name: DailyRecurrence
fields.description: If the schedule will occur once each day of the week, specify the daily recurrence.

fields.name: HourlyRecurrence
fields.description: If the schedule will occur multiple times a day, specify the hourly recurrence.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning status of the resource.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the schedule (i.e. Enabled, Disabled)

fields.name: TargetResourceId
fields.description: The resource ID to which the schedule belongs

fields.name: TaskType
fields.description: The task type of the schedule (e.g. LabVmsShutdownTask, LabVmAutoStart).

fields.name: TimeZoneId
fields.description: The time zone ID (e.g. China Standard Time, Greenland Standard Time, Pacific Standard time, etc.). The possible values for this property can be found in `IReadOnlyCollection<string> TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.KnownWindowsTimeZoneIds` (https://github.com/mattjohnsonpint/TimeZoneConverter/blob/main/README.md)

fields.name: UniqueIdentifier
fields.description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

fields.name: WeeklyRecurrence
fields.description: If the schedule will occur only some days of the week, specify the weekly recurrence.
